name: Bürgerämter Termin
description: Automatic monitoring of available Bürgeramt slots. Use with moderation and remember to shut it off afterwards.

BEFORE_DATE.description: The maximum desired date to look for an available slot at any Bürgeramt.

EMAIL_TEMPLATE.description: Template for the body of the email that is sent when an available slot is found. You can interpolate %{link} and %{date} from termin_de.

EMAIL_TO.description: Email address to send availability notifications to.
